Author: Rowlingstone
Title: [ANN] [ICO] miBoodle Influencer Platform - Passive Income
Body: miBoodle Token sale  Thank you for taking the time to visit our Bitcointalk announcements page.  miBoodle is a decentralized, democratized platform that enables consumers all over the world earn a sustainable income online.  User/Member Focus The miBoodle team has built the first ?Work from home online money-making platform that democratizes the advertising industry based on blockchain technology.  Our goal is to provide a platform that enables all consumers to earn a 2nd income online in an efficient, transparent and responsible way, utilizing tried and tested online digital advertising channels which have been packaged up for the mass market.  There are a host of online money-making schemes for consumers based on un-tried and un-tested methods.  miBoodle opens up the world of online advertising which until now has been exclusively for major corporations to the general public.  miBoodle enables people to build advertising ready and approved monetization assets while providing all members a route to market based on Social media integrations.    miBoodle enables all consumers to become a micro-publisher, a micro-social influencer and a micro-affiliate. Imagine a platform that opens up the world of online advertising and enables everybody to earn money online the way big corporations do, well this is miBoodle and it is free to use!  miBoodle members earn money every day and can get paid monthly in either fiat (?s, $s, ?s etc) currency or miBoodle tokens.  If a member decides to get paid in miBoodle tokens they can use these tokens to gain entry to the next miBoodle tier which means they can earn more money per month, hold these tokens, or sell the tokens so other people to gain entry to the miBoodle tiers, thus enabling new miBoodle members to jump straight into the higher earning tiers, the choice is the members!    miBoodle offers its members 4 tiers with each tier enabling all members to earn more fiat currency or miBoodle tokens on a monthly basis.  Advertising Focus Utilising proven digital advertising channels provides our marketing advertisers, networks and agency partners with 1) accurate performance data, and 2) Transparency through marketing campaign data insights. Until now have sat in isolated environments which over time do not accurately reflect the dynamic and ever changing advertising market place.  As the Worlds first ?Work from Home? blockchain platform miBoodle will open the world of online advertising to a wider audience, generating sustainable revenues for our members while maximizing trust and transparency for our advertisers. We are empowering consumers all over the world to build a 2nd income stream through miBoodle which is secure, transparent, and beneficial for all parties including consumers who have been left behind in the current advertising bonanza. Members can now take advantage of their social media influence, and maximize their reach capability using our platform. Users will be armed with our tools to compete with current affiliate and celebrity advertisers in the social media marketplace.  All advertiser reporting, performance and insights, coupled with miBoodle member monthly performance and revenue generation, is hashed to the Ethereum blockchain with smart contracts to create the MIBO-Data generated eco-system which provide visibility to drive greater results for advertisers and increased earning opportunities for miBoodle members.    Blockchain Using the functionality created within the miBoodle consumer offering & overlaying all membership data with marketing campaign and performance data, enables members to use MIBO (miBoodle token) and take advantage of our unique member and advertiser scoring system. The scoring system has been specifically designed to increase the performance of all advertising campaigns within the miBoodle network and beyond. Take the power of this system to propel your social influence to greater reach!  Our platform uses blockchain, cross relationship data, and analytics to understand in real-time the advertiser solutions to increase the performance of marketing campaigns both inside and outside of the platform. The MIBO token enhances the data available within the platform from current members, while acting as an incentive to increase membership and overall data available to create a true MIBO-Data generated eco-system to enable brands, agencies, and marketing networks and increase overall marketing campaign performance, success rates, and ultimately their ROI.  Operating cross-network partnerships, the data will create an enrichment platform for advertisers while putting all members in charge of their own new, enhanced capabilities. This is the core of the product and enables members to be part of a truly decentralized and revenue-based operation.  The miBoodle Token will be based on Ethereum, a blockchain-based distributed computing platform that allows for smart contracts.  Using blockchain technology to build and distribute a high performance-advertising network will enable advertisers to increase marketing campaign performance & distribution.  By automatically storing all members? personal data, extended network data, social interests, core web usage data, advertising performance and metrics data, will allow us to build a decentralized, high-performance advertiser network based on member profile scoring metrics, and provide our members with a results-based income generating platform that displays advertising and marketing campaigns which are highly relevant to them and their own extended social audience.  MIBO Advertiser Intelligence Network on Blockchain Combining multiple advertiser assets into a consumer centric platform where members are in control of the information being shared inside and outside of the application provides a unique opportunity for advertisers to increase the performance of all advertiser campaigns.  Using proprietary algorithms and scoring techniques we have created a true multi-layer propensity scoring system utilizing all data to enhance, enrich and increase the performance of all marketing campaigns within miBoodle that is hashed to the Ethereum blockchain, which increase all miBoodle member earnings.  MIBO tokens on Blockchain MIBO is the decentralized crypto-currency of the miBoodle ecosystem and has two main purposes.   1) MIBO is the utility that increases the member?s activity, which increases members earning through the miBoodle tiers.   2) By increasing the membership activity the MIBO acts as a data distributor increasing the volume of actionable data we are able to extract, enhance and enrich within the blockchain to increase the performance of advertising campaigns inside and outside of the miBoodle platform.  miBoodle Blockchain Workflow A simple visualization of the MIBO-Data Eco-system and MIBO-Advertiser Intelligence network working in tandem to increase the performance of advertisers campaigns based on a scoring system within miBoodle enabling all members to increase earnings.  miBoodle Information Token site - www.tokens.miboodle.com Site - www.miboodle.com Twitter - https://twitter.com/miboodleITO Twitter -  https://twitter.com/miboodle Facebook -  https://www.facebook.com/Miboodle/ Youtube -  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCy_SDeEmFBIr_oa2fog_Trg Instagram -  http://instagram.com/miboodle Linkedin -  https://www.linkedin.com/company/miboodle Reddit -  https://www.reddit.com/r/miBoodle/ Blog - http://miboodle.com/blog/ Telegram - https://t.me/miboodle_officialITO  miBoodle Token (MIBO) details - 600m tokens created - ERC-20 - Private sale open now - Official sale May 1st to 31st 2018 - Token price ?0.10p or $0.14c - Tokens distributed on purchase  English WhitePaper - https://www.tokens.miboodle.com/files/miBoodle%20White%20Paper_Version%201.9.pdf Japanese White Paper - https://www.tokens.miboodle.com/files/miBoodle%20White_Paper%20Japanese%20Translation.pdf Korean White Paper - https://www.tokens.miboodle.com/files/miBoodle%20White_Paper%20Korean%20Translation.pdf  Visit Token site - www.tokens.miboodle.com
